text: Tell me everything that you see going on. Well, a youngster got up on a stool and he's trying to get into the cookie jar and the little girl is already waiting for the cookies so she's standing there with her hand out. Oh my, and mother is very busy. Oh, she forgot to look at the spigots. They're still open and the water is pouring from the sink and she's looking at it like it's what am I going to do now? And there are some dishes on the countertop and you can see out to the yard. The curtains are nice. This little boy is on tilt though. That little stool is going to fall. She has a dish in her hand that she's drying and she looks a little perplexed. What am I going to do with all this water on the floor? .. And then you can see there's another house next door evidently. Looks like a house in a tree back there beyond the
